actions.name: AnalyzeDocument
actions.description: Grants permission to detect instances of real-world document entities within an image provided as input

actions.name: AnalyzeExpense
actions.description: Grants permission to detect instances of real-world document entities within an image provided as input

actions.name: AnalyzeID
actions.description: Grants permission to detect relevant information from identity documents provided as input

actions.name: CreateAdapter
actions.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon Textract adapter

actions.name: CreateAdapterVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon Textract adapter version

actions.name: DeleteAdapter
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon Textract adapter

actions.name: DeleteAdapterVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon Textract adapter version

actions.name: DetectDocumentText
actions.description: Grants permission to detect text in document images

actions.name: GetAdapter
actions.description: Grants permission to get an Amazon Textract adapter

actions.name: GetAdapterVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to get an Amazon Textract adapter version

actions.name: GetDocumentAnalysis
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about a document analysis job

actions.name: GetDocumentTextDetection
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about a document text detection job

actions.name: GetExpenseAnalysis
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about an expense analysis job

actions.name: GetLendingAnalysis
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve page-level information regarding a lending analysis job

actions.name: GetLendingAnalysisSummary
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve summarized information regarding a lending analysis job

actions.name: ListAdapterVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to list Amazon Textract adapter versions

actions.name: ListAdapters
actions.description: Grants permission to list Amazon Textract adapters

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to return a list of tags associated with a resource

actions.name: StartDocumentAnalysis
actions.description: Grants permission to start an asynchronous job to detect instances of real-world document entities within an image or pdf provided as input

actions.name: StartDocumentTextDetection
actions.description: Grants permission to start an asynchronous job to detect text in document images or pdfs

actions.name: StartExpenseAnalysis
actions.description: Grants permission to start an asynchronous job to detect instances of invoices or receipts within an image or pdf provided as input

actions.name: StartLendingAnalysis
actions.description: Grants permission to start an asynchronous job for detection of entities in a lending document, takes a provided image or PDF as input

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add one or more tags to a resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove one or more tags from a resource

actions.name: UpdateAdapter
actions.description: Grants permission to update Amazon Textract adapter
